description: On July 24, 2025, NASA’s Curiosity Mars rover captured an image of a small, coral-shaped rock in Gale Crater using its ChemCam Remote Micro Imager. The light-colored, 1-inch (2.5 cm) formation likely formed billions of years ago when mineral-rich water seeped into tiny fractures in the rock, leaving behind hardened mineral veins after evaporation. Over time, relentless Martian winds sandblasted the surrounding material, revealing the rock’s intricate, branching structure. While its appearance closely resembles marine coral, scientists stress it is a geological artifact—known as a pseudofossil—rather than evidence of life. The discovery reinforces mounting evidence that ancient Mars had abundant liquid water and could have supported microbial life. Since landing in 2012, Curiosity has explored Gale Crater’s layered terrain, uncovering clues to the Red Planet’s wet history and its potential habitability in the distant past.
title: NASA’s Curiosity Rover Spots Ancient Coral-Like Rock on Mars

description: Raphael Domjan, a Swiss eco-explorer, achieved an 8,224-meter altitude in his SolarStratos aircraft, edging closer to breaking the solar-powered flight record. The attempt, departing from Sion Airport, showcased the potential of renewable energy in aviation.
title: Raphael Domjan Nears Solar Flight World Record with 8,224-Metre SolarStratos Journey

description: SUTD’s maple seed-inspired monocopter achieves a record 26-minute flight with a single rotor. Lightweight, efficient, and simple, it offers promising uses in environmental monitoring and research. The project reflects a 10-year journey from large endurance drones to compact, power-efficient designs.
title: Singapore Researchers Build Maple Seed Drone with Record 26-Minute Flight

description: The 2025 thriller Drop—released theatrically on April 11—has become a compelling addition to high-concept techno-thrillers. Starring Meghann Fahy, the story centers around a first-date gone disturbingly wrong, with malicious anonymous messages turning a romantic evening into a deadly game.
title: Drop Now Streaming on JioHotstar: What You Need to Know About This Gripping Mystery Thriller

description: The habitable zone, or “Goldilocks zone”, is the region around a star where conditions allow liquid water to exist. Varying with star type, this zone is key in the search for life. Earth’s location in the Sun’s habitable zone has made life possible, and astronomers seek similar rocky exoplanets in other systems to explore the possibility of extraterrestrial life.
title: Habitable Zone Explained: The ‘Goldilocks Zone’ Where Life-Friendly Planets May Exist

description: Streaming on JioHotstar from August 11, 2025, Loventure is India’s bold new romance reality show hosted by Shefali Bagga and Faizal Qureshi. Set on a tropical beach, the show promises high drama, unexpected twists, and unforgettable contestants. Early online buzz has already made Loventure one of the most anticipated shows of the year.
title: Loventure Now Streaming on JioHotstar: What You Need to Know About India’s Bold New Romance Reality Show

description: One Piece is a fantasy adventure series that is set to release in 2026 with its second season. The series will follow the Straw Hats, embarking on a journey to obtain the treasure while facing challenges and new enemies. Streaming starts from 2026.
title: One Piece Season 2 Teaser Out: Know When and Where to Watch Season 2 Online

description: A 3D-printed robot crab named “Wavy Dave” was deployed among real fiddler crabs in Portugal to mimic mating displays. The study revealed surprising reactions—rival males waved longer, avoided conflict with larger claws, and even attacked the robot. These findings offer new insights into how crabs adjust their courtship behavior in response to perceived competition in dynamic environments.
title: Robot 'Wavy Dave' Fools Crabs, Gets Attacked in Mating Claw Contest

description: Oh Enthan Baby is a 2025 Tamil romance starring Mithila Palkar as Meera. Her character stands out for emotional depth and maturity, helping highlight lessons about love and self-respect, making the film relatable for young viewers and fans of modern romantic dramas.
title: Meera’s Role in Oh Enthan Baby: Story, Character & Movie Highlights

description: Sony ULT Tower 9, ULT Tower 9AC, ULT Field 5, ULT Field 3 speakers, and ULTMIC1 wireless microphone have been launched in India. The ULT Field 5 and ULT Field 3 have IP67-rated dust and water-resistant builds and support multipoint connectivity. The Tower 9 is said to offer up to 25 hours of playback, while the 9AC features a plug-and-play design. The ULTMIC1 mic offers plug-and-play connectivity as well. All speakers include a ULT bass boost button.
title: Sony ULT Tower 9, ULT Tower 9AC, ULT Field 5, ULT Field 3 and ULTMIC1 Launched in India

description: TecSox Omega TWS earbuds have been launched in India. They feature an ergonomic design and are powered by 10mm speaker drivers. The earbuds support Bluetooth 5.3 connectivity for pairing. The earphones have an IPX-rated build for water and splash resistance.
title: TecSox Omega TWS Earbuds With Up to 30 Hours Playback Time Launched in India

description: Battlefield 6's first open beta points to a back to the basics experience, with a focus on the series' trademark intense gunplay, large-scale battles on vast maps, and destructible environments.
title: Battlefield 6 Open Beta Impressions: Call of Duty Finally Has Competition

description: iQOO Z10 Lite 4G has been listed on the company’s website in Russia with a different design and a Snapdragon chipset. The handset is being offered in two colour options. The iQOO Z10 Lite 5G with a MediaTek Dimensity 6300 chipset was recently launched in India. The Russian variant appears with a slightly different rear camera module and back panel design.
title: iQOO Z10 Lite 4G With Snapdragon 685 Chip, 50-Megapixel Camera Launched: Price, Specifications

description: The JBL Tour Pro 3 is available in India at Rs. 19,999. At this price point, it aims to compete with the most premium offerings from Bose, Sennheiser, Sony, and others, aided by a Smart Charging Case that offers a vast range of features. But do the TWS earbuds reign supreme or become just another TWS option in the market? Here is the JBL Tour Pro 3 review for you to find out.
title: JBL Tour Pro 3 Review: The Sony WF-1000XM5 Killer?

description: OnePlus revealed a new partnership with  Indian electronics manufacturing services (EMS) company Bhagwati Products Ltd (BPL) on Tuesday to locally produce and supply its premium tablets in India. The recently launched OnePlus Pad Lite and OnePlus Pad 3 are confirmed to be produced in the country as part of this strategic alliance. The new tablets were launched in the country last month.
title: OnePlus Partners Bhagwati Products to Assemble OnePlus Pad 3, OnePlus Pad Lite in India

description: Zomato users in India can now renew their Gold membership for Re. 1, as spotted on the app, though not officially announced. Launched in 2023 at Rs. 149 for three months, Gold offers free delivery on orders over Rs. 199 within 7km and up to 30 percent extra discount at multiple restaurants. The deal appears to be a limited-time in-app offer.
title: Zomato Gold Membership Renewal Price Drops to One Rupee for Some Customers

description: Apple is reportedly working on a cheaper, entry-level MacBook model that might not be part of either the Air or Pro lineup. This is in line with a recent leak. However, the price range and launch timeline were not reported. The laptop is said to be powered by an A18 Pro chip, which currently powers the iPhone 16 Pro and iPhone 16 Pro Max.
title: Apple MacBook Model With A-Series Chip, Affordable Price Tag to Launch in Early 2026: Report

description: Realme P4 series is scheduled to launch in India later this month. The company recently teased a few features of the phone. Now, the Chinese smartphone maker has confirmed more specifications of the upcoming handsets. The Realme P4 5G will be powered by a MediaTek Dimensity 7400 Ultra SoC. As previously teased, the Realme P4 Pro 5G will feature a Qualcomm Snapdragon 7 Gen 4 chipset.
title: Realme P4 Series Key Specifications Confirmed Ahead of Launch in India on August 20

description: Sennheiser has launched the Accentum Open True Wireless earphones in India. These TWS earbuds feature an open-ear design and are equipped with 11mm dynamic drivers. They have an IPX4 rating for splash resistance and support multi-device pairing. Sennheiser claims up to 28 hours of total playback time for the earphones.
title: Sennheiser Accentum Open TWS Earphones Launched in India With IPX4 Rating, Up to 28 Hours of Battery Life

description: Flipkart Independence Day Sale 2025 will begin on August 13 with discounts on a wide range of products. Leading brands will offer new laptop models at discounted rates in the upcoming sale. The Samsung Galaxy Book 4, Apple MacBook Air are confirmed to see price cuts. Here's everything you need to know about the top laptop deals before the Flipkart Independence Day Sale 2025 begins.
title: Flipkart Independence Day Sale 2025: Best Deals on Laptops Teased Before the Sale Begins

description: Flipkart’s Independence Day Sale 2025 will run from August 13 to August 17, offering discounts on products from appliances to gadgets, along with cashback, coupons, and exchange offers. Canara Bank cardholders can get 10 percent off, and HDFC Bank customers get 10 percent off on EMI transactions. Flipkart has teased TV deals, revealing sale prices for a few models, with full pricing details for other products expected once the sale starts.
title: Flipkart Independence Day Sale 2025: Top Discounts and Offers on Smart TVs

description: Honor X7c 5G will soon make its way to India after its debut in select global markets last year. The dedicated landing page of the phone on an e-commerce platform has revealed its key specifications, along with its design. The upcoming handset will feature a 50-megapixel AI motion rear camera. It will pack a 5,200mAh battery with 35W fast charging support.
title: Honor X7c 5G Specifications Teased Ahead of India Launch; Will Feature 5,200mAh Battery, Snapdragon 4 Gen 2 SoC

description: Pika Labs introduced its new artificial intelligence (AI) social iOS app on Monday. Dubbed Pika Social AI Video, the app enables users to take a selfie and then convert it into an AI-generated short video using platform-integrated models. Once a video has been created, users can also share it with others via a social feed.
title: Pika Labs Launches Social AI Video App on iOS, Unveils New Audio-Driven Video Generation AI Model

description: Leaked renders of the Samsung Galaxy A07 show it in green, light blue, and dark blue shades, with a pill-shaped dual rear camera module and a water-drop notch display. The handset is expected to include a 6.7-inch 90Hz HD PLS LCD screen, a MediaTek Helio G99 SoC, a 50-megapixel primary rear camera, an 8-megapixel front camera, and a 5,000mAh battery. It may ship with Android 15-based One UI 7, alongside six years of OS and security updates.
title: Samsung Galaxy A07 Design, Colour Options, Key Features Leaked; Tipped to Get Six Android OS Upgrades

description: Samsung Micro RGB TV (2025) has been unveiled for the South Korean market. The company will soon launch the TV in the US, followed by a global launch. The 115-inch TV comes with a solar cell smart remote control. It features 4K resolution and gets ALLM for gamers, along with a filmmarker mode. The company claims it to be the first 115-inch Micro RGB TV.
title: Samsung Micro RGB TV (2025) Launched With 4K Resolution, Up to 144Hz Refresh Rate

description: Vu Glo QLED TV 2025 (Dolby Edition) was launched in India on Tuesday. It is available in five sizes options, ranging from 43 inches to 75 inches. The QLED TV runs on the Google TV platform and is powered by the VuOn AI Processor, paired with 2GB of RAM. As per the company, it has equipped Dolby Vision, HDR10, and HLG technologies for visual enhancement, while there is also Dolby Atmos for audio.
title: Vu Glo QLED TV 2025 (Dolby Edition) Launched in India: Price, Specifications

description: Anthropic is adding a new artificial intelligence (AI) feature to its Claude chatbot. On Monday, the San Francisco-based AI firm announced a new feature that will allow Claude to remember and refer to previous conversations with the user. With this, users can pick up a conversation from where they left off.
title: Anthropic Brings New Claude Feature That Will Let the Chatbot Refer to Past Conversations

description: EA reportedly turned down BioWare's pitch to remaster Dragon Age: Origins, Dragon Age 2, and Dragon Age: Inquisition as a trilogy, according to a former producer. The studio wanted to remaster the first three games in the series, much like Mass Effect Legendary Edition.
title: EA Turned Down Pitch for Dragon Age Trilogy Remaster, Says Former BioWare Producer

description: Flipkart Independence Day Sale in India kicks off tomorrow (August 13). Buyers will be able to purchase devices from brands such as Apple, Motorola, Nothing, Oppo, and Vivo at considerably lower prices than their usual market rates. Ahead of the Independence Day Sale, Flipkart has revealed a handful of deals on smartphones that will go live tomorrow.
title: Flipkart Independence Day Sale 2025 Begins Tomorrow: Deals on iPhone 16, Samsung Galaxy S24, and More

description: GitHub CEO Thomas Dohmke announced on Monday that he is resigning from his position. The announcement came nearly four years after he was elevated to the position following former CEO Nat Friedman’s departure. Dohmke said he was leaving the company to pursue his dream of becoming a startup founder again.
title: GitHub CEO Thomas Dohmke Announces Resignation, to Leave by End of 2025

description: Elon Musk accused the Apple of breaching antitrust regulations in managing the App Store rankings and said that his artificial intelligence startup xAI would take legal action against the iPhone maker.
title: Musk Says xAI to Take Legal Action Against Apple Over App Store Rankings

description: OnePlus is said to be currently testing a device that could feature a flat display with a 1.5K resolution and 165Hz refresh rate. The new display technology could be trialled on the company's mid-range smartphones first. The handset could be part of the OnePlus Ace 6 series.
title: OnePlus Said to Be Testing Display With 165Hz Refresh Rate; Might Arrive on Midrange Smartphone

description: Samsung Galaxy S25 FE is expected to launch soon. However, ahead of its purported launch, the phone has been spotted on a British retailer’s website. The leaked specifications and design suggest that the upcoming handset might resemble the Galaxy S24 FE and feature the same SoC. The Galaxy S25 FE appears with a hole-punch camera cutout on the front, which will house the selfie camera.
title: Samsung Galaxy S25 FE Listing Hints at Price, Design; Might Not Arrive With Upgraded Chip

description: The Vivo V60 has finally made its way to the Indian market. It carries on the legacy of being primarily a camera-centric offering, inherited from its predecessor which was introduced almost six months ago. At a starting price of Rs. 36,999 for the base configuration with 8GB of RAM and 128GB of onboard storage, the Vivo V60 falls in a highly competitive price bracket. But does the handset manage to stand out? Here are our first impressions of the Vivo V60.
title: Vivo V60 First Impressions

description: Vivo V60 was launched in India on Tuesday, with a 6.77-inch 1.5K quad-curved AMOLED display and runs on a Snapdragon 7 Gen 4 chip with up to 16GB RAM. It ships with Android 15-based Funtouch OS 15, offering 4 years of OS and 6 years of security updates, alongside multiple AI tools. The phone has a 50-megapixel triple rear camera setup, a 50-megapixel front camera, a 6,500mAh battery with 90W charging, and an in-display fingerprint sensor for security.
title: Vivo V60 Launched in India With Snapdragon 7 Gen 4, 50-Megapixel Telephoto Camera: Price, Features

description: Apple has rolled out iOS 26 Beta 6 for iPhone to developers and beta testers. The update arrives a week after the rollout of the fourth developer beta of the upcoming firmware. While there are no major new features compared to previous iterations, the iOS 16 Beta 6 update carries subtle changes. For instance, there are several new ringtones which users can set.
title: Apple Releases iOS 26 Beta 6 for iPhone With New Ringtones, Faster App Launch Animations

description: Google Pixel 10 series is all set to go official later this month. Ahead of the Made By Google event, official-looking renders of the Pixel 10, Pixel 10 Pro, and Pixel 10 Pro XL have been leaked on the Web. The new phones could retain similar design elements as the Pixel 9 series. They are shown in multiple colour options.
title: Google Pixel 10, Pixel 10 Pro, Pixel 10 Pro XL Design and Colourways Leaked in New Set of Renders

description: According to a tipster, the iPhone 17 Pro will move its antennas to surround the rear camera module, similar to the Apple Watch Ultra, to improve reception and stability. Unlike current edge-mounted antennas, this layout is expected to reduce interference, enhance 5G mmWave and Wi-Fi 7 performance, and maintain strong connections in crowded or mobile conditions. It could offer a cleaner side-frame design, free internal space for other hardware, and deliver a more even signal with fewer dead zones, potentially setting a new industry benchmark.
title: iPhone 17 Pro to Feature Repositioned Antennas Around Camera Module for Better Connectivity, Tipster Claims

description: The Redmi Note 15 Pro series is all set to be introduced in China, a company official announced via social media on Tuesday. The lineup is expected to comprise two models — Redmi Note 15 Pro and Redmi Note 15 Pro+. While specifications remain under wraps, the latter is speculated to come with support for satellite connectivity and a 7,000mAh battery. Alongside, the official also highlighted the sales numbers of the entire Redmi Note series to date.
title: Redmi Note 15 Pro Series China Launch Confirmed for August; May Offer Satellite Connectivity

description: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge is a new model in the flagship Galaxy S series which sports a sleek profile, despite sharing internals with its siblings. Although it debuted just a few months ago in May, the rumour mill is already churning out information about its successor. Now, the purported Samsung Galaxy S26 Edge has visited a benchmarking platform which indicates that it could be powered by the upcoming Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC successor.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Edge Surfaces on Geekbench With Snapdragon 8 Elite 2 Chipset

description: Vivo V60 is all set to be launched in India today (August 12). It is expected to arrive as the successor to the Vivo V50, which debuted in February. In the days leading up to its launch, the brand has been revealing several details about the phone. Here's all you need to know about the Vivo V60, including its price, expected features and specifications ahead of launch today.
title: Vivo V60 Launching Today: Know Price, Features, Specifications and More
